p: Antimicrobial agents were provided as purified powder by the manufacturer (Sigma Aldrich, Rome, Italy). Stock solutions at different concentrations were prepared in sterile and pyrogen-free 0.9% saline or water, according to the manufacturer’s instructions. The activity of the tested antimicrobials was expressed as μg/mL whereas the activity of TTO was expressed as % v/ v. The used TTO was commercially acquired as a pure and natural commercial formulation (ESPERIS S. P. A. Milan, Italy).
